嵰字的基本解释

嵰
qīn
古同“嵚”。

嵰
qiǎn
山险峻貌。

嵰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiǎn］
［《廣韻》丘檢切，上琰，溪。］
(1)山高貌。
(2)地名用字。参见“嵰州”。

嵰字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嵰； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页317第43
【廣韻】【集韻】?丘檢切，音遣。【玉篇】嵰嶮，山高峻貌。　又【集韻】丘廉切，音?。義同。

嵰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嵰字的起名意思

山险峻貌。

嵰
Basic explanation of words
嵰
qīn
Ancient Tong "嵚".
嵰
qiǎn
The mountains are steep and steep.
嵰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiǎn］
["Guangyun" Yau check and cut, Shangyan, Xi. ]
(1) The appearance of the mountain.
(2) Words used in place names. See "Xizhou".
嵰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嵰; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 317-43
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Qiu check and cut, and sound sent. [Jade articles] Laowei, the mountains are high and majestic.　[Jiyun] Qiu Lianqie, sound?. The same meaning.
